name: Coins Kingdom
description:
I ACCIDENTALLY DELETED THE WEBGL VERSION WHEN TRYING TO UPDATE THE GAME AND I CAN'T REUPLOAD IT

Here it is though:

Coins Kingdom WebGL Version by Yousif A (itch.io)

This was made for the Blackthornprod game jam! 

Theme:

Less is more

How to play:

Collect all coins and throw into lava to be able to finish the level
